posts.title: App Controlled Smart Dog Bone Toy
posts.content: Keeping your dog active and entertained during the day is easier than ever with this handy app controlled smart dog bone toy. It can be remotely controlled from your smartphone or can be programmed to move on its own -ensuring your pup gets the proper amount of exercise.

posts.title: Doggie Pedal Water Fountain
posts.content: Improve your dog’s cognitive skills and self reliance with this doggie pedal water fountain. All your dog has to dog is step on the pedal to open the water fountain valve – just remember to train your dog to only use it when he’s thirsty.

posts.title: Hot/Cold Thermoelectric Cooler
posts.content: Keep your food and beverages at the perfect temperature while you’re on the road by storing them inside this hot/cold thermoelectric cooler. Powered by a small motor, it can either be utilized as a cooler to keep your food chilled or a warming box ideal for hot meals.

posts.title: Star Wars Cuckoo Clock
posts.content: Witness a stellar battle of good versus evil at the top of every hour with this Star Wars cuckoo clock. This stunning timepiece showcases Vader and Luke’s iconic fight – complete with illuminated lightsabers – as Emperor Palpatine watches from the sidelines.

posts.title: Homesick Scented Candles
posts.content: Make your new place feel a little more like home by lighting up your very own homesick scented candle. Each hand poured all natural soy wax candle features its very own unique scent that captures the essence of places like Denver, LA, NYC, the UK, and Australia.

posts.title: Beer Keg Cooler
posts.content: Dispense ice cold brews anytime, anywhere with this beer keg cooler. Simply connect a keg of beer and a Co2 tank to the cooler and pour from one of the two dispensers – it will pour out ice cold as the beer travels through the 50 feet of stainless steel coil.

posts.title: Fifty Shades Of Chicken Cookbook
posts.content: Satisfy your darkest culinary desires by reading about Miss Chicken in the Fifty Shades of Chicken cookbook. Her exploits with a wealthy, sexy and very hungry chef lead her into risque predicaments that’ll leave you feeling all hot, hungry, and bothered.

posts.title: Million Dollars, But… The Card Game
posts.content: What would you do for a million dollars? Now you can put your morals and dignity to the test by playing a round of “Million Dollars, But…”. Using a “trigger” and “rule” card, players take turns creating the most depraved scenarios imaginable for a million dollars.

posts.title: Vehicle Flood Protection Cover
posts.content: Minimize the risk of water damage to your precious ride by shielding it using this vehicle flood protection cover. It’s available in two distinct sizes to accommodate various car lengths and is designed to provide protection from water damage up to 36″ high.

posts.title: Dragon Skull Incense Burner
posts.content: Want to keep your house smelling fresh but keep your grizzled reputation intact? Well then the Dragon Skull Incense Burner is here to help you – the incense smoke releases from this epic looking Dragon’s nostrils allowing your house to smell and look great.

posts.title: Motorized Electric Heel Wheels
posts.content: Transform any pair of shoes into some hot skates with these motorized electric heel wheels. They’re equipped with proprietary 50mm urethane wheels, sealed bearings, and will emit an eye-catching spray of sparks as you effortlessly glide along the pavement.

posts.title: Plug-In iPhone Case
posts.content: Eliminate charging cord tangles and tripping hazards with the plug-in iPhone case. Apart from protecting your iPhone from minor bumps and scratches, it features a handy design that allows you to plug the case directly into the wall outlet to charge your phone.
